events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker asking, "Are you, uh, in this to the end?" and questioning the purpose behind the campaign, speaking in a conversational tone. Another male voice responds, stating he's answered the question "a few times" and questioning why it has to be an either-or situation. He emphasizes that winning is the best way to promote a cause, citing his congressional wins and ability to get his district to understand "true liberty." He concludes by saying that winning elections has been "very beneficial to promoting that cause" and ends by saying "it doesn't bother me."
